data.text: Even more beautiful, even faster, even more "alternative"! We've revamped the look of #AlternativeGuide, our guide written for discerning travellers. Check it out on #AirDolomitiBlog! https://t.co/wTJhfEZSXv

And also this year with the arrival of the #Oktoberfest we are happy to delight our passengers 🍻🍽️🍖
A special thanks to the chef Barbara Schlachter-Ebert who created our #businessclass passengers' #menu. 
Are you ready? ✈️
  #AirDolomiti #AdAstra #SchlossangerAlp https://t.co/UteD75ILwH

data.text:
Congrats @MUC_Airport! 👏👏👏
#NetZero2050 https://t.co/V3GI0sS6dH
RT @MUC_Airport: Those who want to be successful must not stand still in their development. Munich Airport is already preparing for future…

Today our President visited the new Air Dolomiti’s #FlyingAcademy. For many, becoming a pilot is a dream come true but it requires commitment and dedication. Thus, what better wish than the motto: “Per aspera #AdAstra”, through hardships… to the stars! https://t.co/3g9xNo2mUO

Discover the contemporary side to Rennaissance Florence and see how Prato has made the most of its industrial past to develop a new calendar of cultural events with our creative itinerary of these two fascinating cities on the #AirDolomitiBlog 👈 https://t.co/FeqNVdgh8d

data.text: Starting into this new week like ✈️ https://t.co/XU8MnRLthm

💃🎻 Opera season is is not only about lyrics. The Opera season is also about emotions, love, customs and so much more. 🎻💃

What are you waiting for? The program of the Verona Arena Opera Festival 2019 is out! 

 https://t.co/XU9ngx5lRS
How come you we ask you to turn your mobile phone off during a flight? Today on the #AirDolomitiBlog we try to explain it as simply as possible 😉 https://t.co/I2NFugR8Ry

We're sure you've heard of an auto pilot, but only our trusty #avgeeks, who outdo each other with their comments, truly know how it works! 😉 For everyone else there's the #AirDolomitiBlog.  https://t.co/FFlWlI9fVS

North of #Verona lies a place that could easily have sprung forth from the end of Tolkien's pen. You won't be able to escape stories of wolves, bears and sacred dances on your next trip to #Lessinia. Explore the area in our🌲#AlternativeGuide🌲https://t.co/zKLW5XfwJ2 https://t.co/EyN8cYBYma
RT @LeonardMiron: STRONG ESENCES ARE KEEPT IN SMALL BOTTLES https://t.co/q8aGh4MOQ3 https://t.co/xdpsHwYDKl
Are you a true #artaddict? Then make sure not to miss the #Biennale Arte 2019 in #Venice and our best tips on the must-see pavilions on the #AirDolomitiBlog Enjoy! https://t.co/37zZxwQFMv

data.text: So many men and women have contributed to the history of aviation. Today, we wanted to tell you about one in particular, who at just 25 years old accomplished something truly extraordinary. Find out more on the #AirDolomitiBlog   https://t.co/WJkGCPquRS

*** IMPORTANT INFORMATION ***
On May 1st our social media channels will not be staffed and our Sales Center will remain closed. 

For assistance: https://t.co/xrBI3IKAnD

See you on May the 2nd 🤗

✈️ The principles of dynamics: if you really are an #avgeek, you'll almost certainly know what we're talking about. In this article, we let the laws of physics show you why aeroplanes can fly! #AirDolomitiBlog https://t.co/pY69NXVSj6

By https://t.co/TqtHh5XsC5 @MunSecConf @Air_Dolomiti @MUC_Airport #avgeek https://t.co/q23UYPmX4E
RT @AirbourneColour: A regular feature at our @EMA_Airport paint facility at the moment, with @Air_Dolomiti I-ADJL arriving in the old live…

We have lots in store for you! ☺
✅ new #booth 👁
✅ new #routes 📌
✅ new #livery ✈
✅ new #video 🎥

Pop by to find out more!  Pav. A6, booth 413 #freemesse https://t.co/7xyULnM6oy

In the expectation of a #strike action in Italy, which will affect ground handling services tomorrow, #February 15th: may we invite you to verify the availability of your flight by contacting our Sales Centre (+39 045 288 6140) or LH Customer Service (899 198 000).

data.text: #Pratello is an area in #Bologna's old town that centres on a single large porticoed street. data.text:
There are moments when you realise you’ve achieved your dream.

The return of our JO with its new livery is definitely one of those moments. 
A day on which we were delighted by Chef #AlbertoFaccani , owner of the Magnolia Ristorante, which has ⭐️⭐️ #MichelinStars.

#AirDolomiti https://t.co/HPMe0Lxmoy

It's classified. I could tell you, but then I'd have to kill you. This is just one of the many #quotes that made #TopGun a cult film in the '80s and a source of #inspo for generations of #pilots! Today on the #AirDolomitiBlog https://t.co/OSEgC2uMBa #FlyingAcademy #careers ✈️ https://t.co/gB3WzNxTEW

A glimpse along the #GrandCanal in #Venice will give your visit a sense of timeless romanticism. The Hotel Palazzo Barbarigo welcomes you to its simple and elegant rooms, adding a touch of style to your stay https://t.co/ezSeHfKWXL  #AlternativeGuide @veneziaunica #visitvenice https://t.co/QOoaNzmnIg
